### The Year AI Grew Up: A 2025 Retrospective
2025 wasn't just another year of incremental AI progress. It was the year artificial intelligence transitioned from experimental technology to essential infrastructure, reshaping industries, geopolitics, and how we think about intelligence itself.
## The Reasoning Revolution
The most significant shift came in how AI models think. Early January delivered a shock when Chinese firm DeepSeek released R1, a reasoning model matching OpenAI's best at a fraction of the training cost. This wasn't just a ...
